The presence of a TIME magazine cover fe: s face with a sketched map of the Philippines in the background and the words "PHILIPPINE PRESIDENT MARCOS" in capital letters.
The text on the cover: which claims that Marcos is "THE ONLY PRESIDENT WITH THE MOST PROJECTS EVER BUILT... AND ACQUITTED FROM ALL GRAFT AND CORRUPTION CASES."
The historical context provided: stating that Marcos was the president of the Philippines for 20 years before being ousted in 1986 by a bloodless revolt.
